title: Failed - File Incomplete
body: Can somebody help me? Whenever I try to download Lol or the PBE, it says Failed - File Incomplete. Is it just me? #RitoPlz I dont have to time to wait either, I just fully rebooted my pc and i have 3 things to download. Also, is anybody else missing some .dll files? I tried to restart my entire pc. BTW I have tried Hextech Repair Tool etc.

replies.body: I’m having the same problem. I just recently restarted all my files on my laptop and now I’m trying to redownload league of legends but every time it says failed or file incomplete. I just want to play some league god damnit

I finished downloading it, however when i go to install the game it has an error and starts to repair. Then every time it starts to repair it says 'repair failed' [Looks Like this](https://gyazo.com/392bb751dcb803826b59fae2770d11a0) i've done everything on the info page but nothing works. Please tell me this can be fixed.

edit: [This is the error message from the repair tool](https://gyazo.com/91f41806282fc91b9e6c4c75f1ef4830)

UPDATE: IF you are using Chrome, Click the arrow next to the download file and keep hitting resume. It'll download a few megabytes and fail again. Keep hitting resume until the download finishes. Worked for me!
Seems silly but this worked for me as well!

> [{quoted}](name=k00chmonkey,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R6lHuEmp,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-10-23T00:28:47.948+0000)
>
> UPDATE: IF you are using Chrome, Click the arrow next to the download file and keep hitting resume. It'll download a few megabytes and fail again. Keep hitting resume until the download finishes. Worked for me!

I don't have to time. I need the PBE and the actual game. #RitoPlz

Thanks for the reports everyone! I've passed this info along to the devs so they can start looking into this for you. I'm not entirely sure myself what might be causing this, but let's go ahead and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and possibly using a different browser or incognito window as well.

Please let me know in a reply if any of you were finally able to get the installer downloaded!

This is with a fresh install of windows 10 - had to format both drives last night {{item:3070}} 
Managed to download but when i go to install it gives me a repairing window which quickly changed to 'repair failed'

HOWEVER
https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload#
I was able to install and launch league using this xx
Same issue here jfc fix this
Same! I wanna test those new runes

Same issue here.  Haven't played League in 2 months, this was finally the day I could do it.  First my client gets all borked, so I try to download it from scratch, and boom, failed download.  Awesome.
I am too having the same issue with LoL client download. It starts downloading then stops and says it failed - file incomplete. You're not alone.
